Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory430.jpg'}
{3: 'The surging waves that echoed in your ears have stopped.'}
{3: 'You open your eyes to find a completely new world.'}
{3: 'The open field of grass is covered in a faint red. Unknown plants coil around tree roots and sprout from the soil.'}
{3: 'You hear the chirpings of nightingales and smell the fragrance and moisture in the air.'}
{3: 'You have never been so aware of your part in the world.'}
{3: 'You can sense that something is waiting for you ahead.'}
{3: 'Thus, you begin walking deeper into the woods.'}
{3: 'Your instinct is quickly confirmed.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_01.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_01.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You are here.'}
{3: 'The girl with the ruby-color eyes smiles at you.'}
{3: 'She sits underneath the shades of an old tree, holding a red flower she just picked in her hands.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Good. You haven't forgotten my name."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I'm glad... I don't have to say goodbye to you again."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Your choice has made the world the way it should be.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I didn't think you could connect with the essence of this world. You've greatly exceeded my expectations."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Don't worry. That's not a bad thing."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Do you remember what I told you at the beginning?'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I can promise you something, even in this world with very few guarantees.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'No matter how your journey ends...'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I'll be there with you until the very last moment."}
{2: 'Is this the end of my journey?', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: '...It is.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'In a way, this is the end.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Congratulations. Your journey is over.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'But my duty is not yet completed.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'The red flowers... have yet to bloom in every corner of the world.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I want to scatter the seeds of the flower that represents "rebirth" everywhere I can see.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I imagine that you wouldn't want to stop here and now, would you?"}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Will you, then... accompany me until the very last moment?'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Hah... I knew you would say that.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Hah... You wouldn't be standing in front of me if you were really unwilling."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "This is the ending you've chosen, the pact you've made with me."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory430.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory430.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She stands up and grabs your hand.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "We'll journey forever in this world you've envisioned.", 4: '1'}
